courses.bio: أهم النقاط التي لم تذكر فى المنهج ، مع دع كتاب ابليكيشن الاختبار ، وبعض النصائح للنجاح فى الاختبار من المره الاولي
objectives: هتعرف ازاي تكتب PfMP exam application و أهم النصائح و tips & tricks علشان الابليكشن بتاعك يقبل من المره الاولي داخل PMI panel review
أهم النقاط التي لم يتم ذكرها داخل كتابي SPM و ECO ولكن بيجي عليهم اسئلة في اختبار PfMP، هيكونوا فى حدود 9 او 10 نقاط تقريبا، وهي بعض الامور المتعلقة بإدارة ال
هنسلط الضوء على آلية لتبسيط ITTOs لانها محل اسئلة كثيره داخل الاختبار وده هيكون من خلال التعرف على:
هنعطيك بعض النصائح العامة اللى تاخدهم فى الحسبان، علشان تساعدك كتير ان شاء الله فى النجاح فى الاختبار من المره الاولي، مع تسليط الضوء على بعض عوامل النجاح بشكل
هنلخص ليك جميع عمليات إدارة المحافظ الــ16 بشكل بسيط وبطريقة احترافية

PfMP Exam Application: How to fill your PfMP Exam Application
Very important Points for PfMP Exam: Very important Points Not Covered on SPM & ECO
Simplify all ITTO`s: Simplify all Inputs, Outputs, Tools & Techniques
General Notes: How to Pass the PfMP exam on your first attempt

requirements: لابد تكون انتهيت من كورس الشرح كاملا او على الأقل اطلعت على محتوي SPM & ECO
تستعد حاليا لكتاب ابليكيشن الاختبار الدولي
courses.description:
للراغبين التحضير لإختبار إدارة المحافظ الإحترافية PfMP ، تم إعداد محاضرة خاصة لدعم من أنتهي من التحضير للإختبار ، ويحتاج الدعم فى بعض المحاور الرئيسية للمساهمة فى تجاوز الاختبار من المحاولة الاولي
تناولنا في هذه المحاضرة الحديث عن خمس محاور رئيسية لن تجدها فى مكان اخر
· المحور الاولي:
يتحدث عن التحدي الأكبر في أختبار PfMP وهو طريقة كتابة الأبلكيشن، و أهم النصائح لكتابة PfMP exam application ، وسبل عكس الخبرات المهنية بالشكل الصحيح واهم النصائح و tips & tricks لتجاوز مراجعة الطلب فى paneled review من المحاولة الاولي.
· المحور التانية :
يتحدث عن أهم النقاط التي لم يتم ذكرها داخل كتابي SPM و ECO والتي تمثل نسبة من اسئلة اختبار PfMP، الى جانب بعض النقاط المتعلقة بإدارة المشاريع وادارة البرامج، اللى بيتم تغطيتها ايضا داخل نطاق ادارة المحافظ ولم يتم التطرق اليها داخل كتابي SPM و ECO
· المحور الثالثة :
هيسلط الضوء على آلية لتبسيط مدخلات ومخرجات والادوات والتقنيات ITTOs لعدد 16 عملية من خلال التعرف على:Common inputs \ outputs , Key deliverables, Tools & techniques
· المحور الرابع:
هنلخص لك جميع العمليات الـ16 عملية اللي بيعتبروا المكون الأساسي لمنهج PfMP واللى هيلخص لك المنهج بالكامل.
· المحور الخامس:
هنعطيك بعض النصائح العامة علشان تساعدك كتير ان شاء الله فى النجاح فى الاختبار من المره الاولي، مع تسليط الضوء على بعض عوامل النجاح بشكل عام، واللى ان شاء الله هتعزز من نجاحك فى اختبار PfMP
كل هذه المعلومات ومعلومات أخري قمنا بإعداداها لمساعدتك على النجاح فى اختبار PfMP من المحاولة الاولي ، وستكون هذه المحاضرة داعم لك بشكل كبير ان شاء الله.
target_audience: اي شخص بيستعد لدخول اختبار ادارة المحافظ الاحترافية PfMP

courses.title: AI時代の経営者/起業家の仕事術
courses.bio: AI時代では脳内のゆとりが収入アップのカギです。このコースでは自分のパフォーマンスを最大限に高め、AIや人に上手く頼り、効率よく仕事を進める方法を実践的に学べる講座です。
objectives: ブレインダンプの驚くべき効果
紙に書き出すことで得られる恩恵
経営者のスケジュールの立て方
具体的なブレインダンプワーク9選

ブレインダンプの驚くべき効果: 紙に書き出す時間＝優雅タイム
ブレインダンプの効果が分かるケーススタディ
具体的なブレインダンプワーク9選: ブレインダンプワーク①
ブレインダンプワーク②
ブレインダンプワーク③
ブレインダンプワーク④
ブレインダンプワーク⑤
ブレインダンプワーク⑥
ブレインダンプワーク⑦
ブレインダンプワーク⑧
ブレインダンプワーク⑨

requirements: インターネット環境
PCやスマホ
集中して受講できる時間と空間
courses.description:
このコースは仕事やプロジェクトを
効率よく進める為のスケジュールの立て方や
ワークを実践的に学べる講座です。


（※このコースに収録されているビデオコンテンツは、
既に終了しているセミナーの録画になります。）


自分がビジネスをやる際にどのように活かせるか？
を学びながら、進めてください。


ChatGPTなどのAIが発達して、これまで以上に
効率よく、生産性を高めて仕事できる環境や
インフラが整っています。


ですが、それを活用するには
あなた自身の脳内で物事をしっかりと把握して
何を、どうするかが明確でないとかなり厳しいです。


実際にChatGPTへのプロンプト(指示出し文章)は
現状と未来、実行する事柄が明らかな程、
よりあなたが求める成果を出してくれます。


これは人も同じで、自分だけでなく
社員やプロジェクトを動かしていく時には
自分の頭の中だけで考えず、可視化して
俯瞰的に捉えることが何より重要なのです。




更に脳内の整理ができていないと
ストレスが溜まるだけでなく、


何かと忙しい人という印象を周囲に与えてしまい
仕事の依頼も減ったり、


小さな問題を大きく捉え過ぎてしまい、
チャンスを取り逃す恐れもあります。




なのでこのコースでは、
AI時代の経営者が行うべきスケジュールの立て方や
ブレインダンプの仕方をワーク形式で解説しています。


実際に私は会社経営して10年以上経ち、
現在は複数の会社を経営していますが
今もこれを実践していますし、


私が主催するビジネススクールで
このコースを学んだ方の中で、
毎月数万円から数十万円が入ってくる
仕組みを構築した方もいます。


ですので、ぜひこのコースで
起業家の仕事術を身につけ、
今よりもっと自由に、もっと自分らしく、希望に満ちた日々を
手に入れてください。


では、コースの中でお会いしましょう。


＜コース内容＞


セクション1 はじめに


セクション2 ブレインダンプの驚くべき効果


セクション3 経営者のスケジュールの立て方


セクション4 具体的なブレインダンプワーク9選


セクション5 Q&A
target_audience: 1,2年で終わらず長期的に稼ぎ続けたいポケビジオーナー
脳内の忙しなさをコントロールして日々最良の決断をしたい経営者、起業家
年々自分の市場価値を高めていきたいフリーランス、個人事業主

courses.title: Angular: La guia master para desarrollar (Edicion 2025)
courses.bio: Utilizaremos SIGNALS, LAZYLOAD, STANDALONE, CONTROL FLOW Y MAS
objectives: Aprenderán a utilizar angular con signals
Aprenderán a utilizar tailwindcss en su version 4
Aprenderán a conectar sus servicios con php y mysql
Crearán aplicaciones interesantes para desarrollar sus habilidades

Introducción: Solucionar el error al ejecutar en la terminal angular
Signals: Manos en el codigo con signals
Tareas pendientes: Creacion de la aplicacion y componentes

requirements: Deben tener conocimiento en angular
Deben tener conocimiento en css
Deben tener conocimiento en html
courses.description:
Angular: La guia master para desarrollar (Edicion 2025)
Este curso te ayudará a aprender Angular en su última versión
Aprenderás un mundo de cosas interesantes que se puede hacer con angular, veremos muchos ejemplos dinámicos y utilizando un código optimizado, bien estructurado y conforme vayas avanzando se pondrán dinámicas similares pero subiendo su grado de dificultad.
En este curso veremos diversos temas como:
TypeScript
Estructura de Angular
Componentes
Teoría
Bootstrap
Angular Material
Login usando firebase
Principales pasos en angular
Pipes
Pipes personalizados
Rutas
Rutas con parámetros
Animaciones
Despliegues a producción
Formularios básicos
Formularios reactivos
Ciclo de vida en Angular
CRUD con firebase
ViewChild - Input - Output
Guards
y mucho mas...
Ahora que ya sabes una tercera parte de los que se verá en el curso, todo está realizado paso a paso para que aprendas cosas nuevas con algunos ejemplos similares para fortalecer lo aprendido.
Cabe recalcar que en todas las secciones se pone el código para que puedas comparar con tu avance y comparar en caso de que te atores y verifiques rápidamente en que fallaste, pero en la última sección no se subirá ya que por ser un tema avanzado, es el reto que tendrás en lograr crear tu login de autenticación validado.
Y como resultado final al curso, tendrás las bases necesarias para crear tus propias plantillas o aplicaciones dinámicas y listas para sacar provecho a tus conocimientos y vender tu propio producto.
Espero disfrutes del curso y no vemos en el.
target_audience: A todo estudiante que quiera aprender a crear aplicaciones con angular y tailwindcss para que a futuro puedan crear sus propios proyectos
El estudiante aprenderá a desempeñar sus habilidades con angular

courses.title: A-CSM (Advanced Certified Scrum Master) - Test Pratique (FR)
courses.bio: Réussissez l'examen A-CSM (Scrum Master Certifié Avancé) avec 500 questions et des explications détaillées.
courses.description:
Préparez-vous à réussir l'examen de certification A-CSM (Scrum Master Certifié Avancé) avec ce cours complet de test pratique. Ce cours contient 5 examens pratiques complets avec un total de 500 questions, chacune accompagnée d'explications détaillées pour vous aider à comprendre en profondeur les concepts et les approches testés lors de l'examen. Les questions ont été soigneusement élaborées pour refléter le niveau de difficulté que vous rencontrerez lors de l'examen de certification réel.
Caractéristiques principales :
5 examens pratiques : Avec un total de 500 questions conçues pour vous aider à évaluer vos connaissances et à vous préparer efficacement.
Diversité des types de questions :
Questions à choix multiples qui testent votre compréhension des concepts clés de Scrum.
Questions à remplir pour évaluer vos connaissances pratiques des cadres Scrum.
Questions basées sur de courts scénarios avec des situations réelles, vous obligeant à appliquer vos compétences en prise de décision et en résolution de problèmes.
Sujets abordés :
Leadership de Scrum Master & Leadership Serviteur
Facilitation des événements Scrum & Engagement des parties prenantes
Élargir Agile & Gérer plusieurs équipes Scrum
Amélioration continue & Intégration des pratiques Agile
Aspects juridiques et conformité dans les cadres Agile
Coaching et mentorat des équipes Scrum
Pratiques Scrum avancées pour des environnements complexes
Résolution des conflits et techniques de négociation
Ce cours offre une simulation d'examen rigoureuse pour vous garantir une préparation complète à l'examen réel. Bien que les examens pratiques couvrent un large éventail de sujets, il est important de noter qu'ils sont plus efficaces lorsqu'ils sont combinés avec d'autres matériaux d'étude, tels que des guides d'étude et des vidéos, pour garantir une compréhension approfondie de tous les exigences de l'examen.
Avertissement :
Ce test pratique est une ressource indépendante et n'est affilié, ni approuvé, ni sponsorisé par Scrum Alliance. Toutes les marques sont la propriété de leurs propriétaires respectifs.
target_audience: ScrumMasters certifiés (CSM) : Les professionnels ayant déjà obtenu leur certification CSM et cherchant à approfondir leur compréhension de Scrum et des pratiques agiles.

Praticiens Scrum : Scrum Masters, Product Owners et autres membres d'équipes Agile souhaitant améliorer leurs connaissances et compétences pour mieux diriger les équipes dans des environnements complexes.
Coachs et consultants Agile : Les personnes travaillant comme coachs agiles ou consultants qui souhaitent affiner leurs compétences et acquérir une compréhension plus avancée des méthodologies Scrum.

Membres expérimentés d'équipes Scrum : Ceux ayant un an ou plus d'expérience dans Scrum et souhaitant se préparer à l'examen A-CSM et faire progresser leur carrière dans des rôles de leadership agile.**

courses.title: Métricas do Kanban
courses.bio: Aprenda a criar quadros Kanban no Trello a partir do zero!
objectives: Kanban
Trello
Agile
Atlassian
Produtividade
requirements: Não há.
courses.description:
Bem-vindo!

Este curso é para todos os que desejam aprender a utilizar o Método Kanban. O Kanban é um método amplamente utilizado em  empresas ao redor do mundo e uma ferramenta indispensável à Gestão de Projetos e Lean. Além de cobrir os conceitos do método e as etapas de sua utilização, o curso aborda também a sua implementação e as principais Métricas que podem ser obtidas a partir do Quadro Kanban.

O curso possui uma abordagem prática e direta, se baseando na criação de um Quadro Kanban a partir de um exemplo real de processo a ser otimizado! Após a implementação do Kanban, são abordadas as principais métricas para a gestão de processos a partir dos Quadros Kanban e o conceito de limitação de Work In Progress.

O curso aborda os seguintes tópicos:
Origem e princípios do Método Kanban
Elementos do Quadro Kanban
Principais métricas dos Quadros Kanban
Limitação de Work In Progress
Principais ferramentas e softwares utilizados na implementação do kanban
Configuração métricas do Kanban no Trello


Não é necessário conhecimento prévio no Método Kanban ou no uso do Trello. A construção do Quadro Kanban e o cálculo de suas principais métricas são demonstrados passo a passo, a partir de exemplos utilizando processos reais. Ao seguir todas as etapas mostradas durante as aulas, o aluno finalizará o curso com um quadro Kanban completo implementado e conhecimento do método!
target_audience: Interessados em Método Kanban
Desenvolvedores de software
Gestores

courses.title: Project Management, Project Life Cycle
courses.bio: Project life cycle from opening to closing
objectives: Project delivery methods
Contract types
FIDIC contracts
Tendering
Awareness of project departments role: Technical office
Awareness of project departments role: Construction site engineers
Awareness of project departments role: Quality control
Explain in details the QS / Commecial department role in the construction project
Awareness of project departments role: Project controls
requirements: No previous technical experience needed
Understanding engineering software such as AutoCAD & Excel
courses.description:
This comprehensive course is designed for fresh graduate engineers up to engineers with 4 years experience who want to master the complete life cycle of engineering and construction projects. Led by Eng. Moustafa Abdellatif, you will gain practical, industry-focused knowledge that bridges theory and real-world application.
Starting with the fundamentals of construction project management, you’ll explore how to balance cost, time, and quality to achieve project success. The course covers every key stage, including project delivery methods such as Design-Bid-Build, Design-Build, Integrated Project Delivery, Public-Private Partnerships, and Construction Manager at Risk.
You will learn about various contract types, including Remeasured, Lump Sum, and Cost Plus, and dive into internationally recognized FIDIC contracts—understanding their clauses, applications, and how they manage risks. The course also guides you through tendering methods, from open to negotiated, and breaks down the roles and responsibilities of project teams: Technical Office, Construction, Quality Control, Quantity Surveying, and Project Control.
By the end of this course, you will have a complete toolkit to plan, execute, and control engineering projects with confidence. Whether you are starting your career or aiming to move into senior management, this course provides the knowledge and skills to deliver successful projects in today’s competitive construction industry.
target_audience: Students for the last year up to who have 4 years experience in construction industry.
This course will help to choose your career path

courses.title: Supply Chain Fundamental: Pengantar Manajemen Rantai Pasok
courses.bio: Memahami Supply & Demand, Planning, Forecasting, Production, Optimization, dan Bidang Manufacture & Sustainability
objectives: Memahami konsep supply and demand
Belajar meramalkan permintaan menggunakan berbagai teknik forecasting, metode mana yang paling mudah, metode mana yang akan memberikan hasil terbaik.
Memahami manufaktur.
Belajar tentang siklus hidup produk dan bagaimana hal itu memengaruhi strategi manufaktur.
Memahami perencanaan produksi.
Belajar Perencanaan Kebutuhan Sumber Daya (Rough-Cut Resource Planning, RRP) untuk memeriksa kapasitas yang diperlukan untuk rencana produksi.
Membuat Jadwal Produksi Utama (Master Production Schedule, MPS) dan memahami Proyeksi Saldo Tersedia (Projected Available Balance, PAB).
Mempelajari alat perencanaan Available-to-Promise (ATP) dan hubungannya dengan membuat komitmen kepada pelanggan.
Mengenali pola permintaan yang berbeda.
Memahami kesalahan forecasting dan cara mengatasinya.
Belajar berbagai strategi manufaktur dan lingkungan yang sesuai untuk produk Anda.
Mengenali berbagai proses manufaktur dan tata letaknya sesuai dengan produk.
Belajar Perencanaan Kapasitas Kasar (Rough-Cut Capacity Planning, RCCP) untuk memeriksa kapasitas yang diperlukan untuk Jadwal Produksi Utama (Master Production
Memahami Perencanaan Kebutuhan Material (Material Requirements Planning, MRP).

Forecasting Demand: Mengenal Factor Alpha pada Exponential Smoothing
Manufacturing: Latihan Memahami Istilah-Istilah Supply Chain dan Manufacture
Sales & Operations Planning: Strategi untuk Developing a Production Plan
Pengantar Material Requirements Planning: Memahami Product Structure File atau Bill of Material (BOM)
Bill of Material - Product Tree Format

requirements: Memiliki semangat untuk belajar
courses.description:
Apakah Anda ingin meningkatkan kemampuan Anda di bidang perencanaan rantai pasok (supply chain) dan produksi? Kursus ini dirancang khusus untuk Anda yang ingin mendalami rantai pasok dan teknik forecasting, memahami perencanaan produksi, dan menguasai kebutuhan material dengan strategi-strategi efektif!


Di kursus ini, Anda akan mempelajari:


Teknik peramalan (forecasting) permintaan dengan metode yang mudah dan akurat.
Strategi produksi berbasis siklus hidup produk yang sesuai dengan kondisi industri Anda.
Alat-alat powerful untuk memprediksi kapasitas dan membuat komitmen kepada pelanggan (Available-to-Promise).
Rencana Kebutuhan Material (Material Requirements Planning, MRP) dan penggunaannya dalam operasi sehari-hari.
Dan masih banyak lagi!


Apa yang Akan Anda Pelajari:
Pemahaman mendalam tentang permintaan dan pola permintaan.
Penguasaan Jadwal Produksi Utama (Master Production Schedule atau MPS).
Strategi manufaktur dan metode Rough-Cut Capacity Planning (RCCP).
Teknik mitigasi kesalahan forecasting yang sering diabaikan.
Penyusunan Rencana Produksi yang efektif dan efisien.


Siapa yang Harus Mengikuti Kursus Ini?
Profesional di bidang supply chain dan produksi yang ingin meningkatkan keahlian.
Mahasiswa yang mempelajari rantai pasok dan teknik industri.
Pemilik bisnis yang ingin mengoptimalkan proses produksi dan inventaris.


Mengapa Kursus Ini Berbeda?
Materi Komprehensif: Semua topik esensial perencanaan rantai pasok ada di sini.
Pendekatan Praktis: Tidak hanya teori, Anda juga belajar dengan latihan.


Setelah Kursus Ini, Anda Akan:
Mampu menganalisis dan merencanakan kebutuhan sumber daya.
Menyusun Jadwal Produksi secara mandiri.
Menguasai strategi manufaktur yang paling relevan dengan produk Anda.
Siap menghadapi tantangan rantai pasok di masa depan.


Jangan lewatkan kesempatan untuk meningkatkan keterampilan Anda di bidang perencanaan rantai pasok dan produksi. Ayo bergabung bersama ratusan profesional lainnya yang telah sukses menguasai keterampilan ini!
target_audience: Siapapun yang ingin mempelajari Supply Chain
Siapapun yang ingin berganti karier di bidang Supply Chain
Siapapun yang telah bekerja di bidang Supply Chain dan membutuhkan pengetahuan baru atau menyegarkan ilmu
Para pengusaha yang ingin memperluas pengetahuan terkait Supply Chain dan Manufacture

courses.title: 4 EXAMENS -PSPO : Devenir Product owner certifé
courses.bio: PSPO : Examen Certification Professional Scrum Product Owner
courses.description:
PSPO : Examen Certification Professional Scrum Product Owner
Préparez-vous à un poste de Product Owner en apprenant l'état d'esprit, les compétences, les responsabilités et les meilleures pratiques de PO nécessaires
LA DEMANDE DU PRODUCT OWNER CONTINUE DE SE DÉVELOPPER ALORS QUE DE PLUS EN PLUS D'ORGANISATIONS ADOPTENT AGILE SCRUM.
CE COURS VOUS ENSEIGNERA LES CONNAISSANCES ET COMPÉTENCES FONDAMENTALES DONT VOUS AVEZ BESOIN POUR ÊTRE UN BON PRODUCT OWNER PO
Le Product Owner (PO) est le rôle le plus critique dans Agile Scrum. Ils sont responsables de communiquer avec les clients, de comprendre leurs désirs et leurs besoins, puis de collaborer avec l'équipe de développement pour créer un produit - un logiciel, un service ou un processus - qui répond aux besoins identifiés.
Dans ce cours, nous vous préparons à ce poste de Product Owner. Nous vous expliquerons l'état d'esprit, les responsabilités, les activités, les compétences, les meilleures pratiques et les concepts de base que vous devrez connaître pour être un Product Owner (PO) performant.


Pourquoi devenir Product Owner en premier lieu ?
1. Gains potentiels - Soyons honnêtes, c'est la principale raison pour laquelle nous travaillons en premier lieu. Ainsi, vous serez heureux d'apprendre qu'un Product Owner (PO) est un poste bien rémunéré. Continuez à augmenter la valeur que vous apportez grâce à l'étude et à la formation, et imaginez combien vous pourriez finir par gagner !
2. Croissance de l'emploi - Avec l'abondance d'organisations adoptant Agile et Scrum, le rôle de Product Owner a bénéficié d'une croissance annuelle et a été déclaré emploi émergent par LinkedIn. Il n'y a pas de meilleur moment que maintenant pour apprendre les bases nécessaires pour être un Product Owner.
3. Tremplin de carrière - Les compétences que vous acquérez en tant que Product Owner sont cruciales pour de nombreuses autres professions, allant des affaires à l'informatique. Ce cheminement de carrière n'est pas seulement un emploi, c'est un investissement dans votre avenir, peu importe où la vie vous mène.
4. Résultats satisfaisants - Être capable d'influencer positivement et de prendre des décisions qui façonnent la valeur qu'un produit offre aux clients génère un sentiment d'accomplissement et d'épanouissement. Et c'est probablement l'une des principales raisons pour lesquelles le Product Owner moyen est très satisfait de son travail.
5. Ce n'est jamais ennuyeux - Les besoins des entreprises et des clients changent et évoluent constamment, et votre produit doit rester à jour. Cela peut signifier de nouvelles fonctionnalités, une modification du flux de travail, une expérience client mise à jour ou l'ajustement de votre produit pour répondre aux besoins d'un nouveau segment de marché. Ce n'est jamais ennuyeux car il y a toujours une valeur ajoutée qui peut être apportée.
Donc, si vous recherchez une carrière stimulante et enrichissante, je vous encourage fortement à envisager sérieusement de devenir Product Owner !
target_audience: Les personnes qui cherchent à changer de carrière et les récents diplômés universitaires
Nouveaux Product Owners souhaitant monter en compétence et générer de la valeur ajoutée
Professionnels de l’IT
Professionnels des services métiers
Etudiants/Jeunes diplômés/chercheurs d’emploi
Analystes d'affaires et professionnels d'affaires qui cherchent à élargir leurs connaissances, leurs compétences et leurs capacités.
Ceux qui envisagent d'obtenir la certification Professional Scrum Product Owner (PSPO)

Áp dụng thực sự trong thực tế
courses.description:
Trong môi trường công việc đầy thách thức hiện nay, việc nhận diện và giải quyết các vấn đề một cách hiệu quả là kỹ năng không thể thiếu. Bạn có bao giờ cảm thấy bế tắc khi gặp phải những vấn đề phức tạp mà không biết bắt đầu từ đâu? Khóa học "Giải quyết Vấn đề với AI và 8 công cụ mạnh nhất 2024" được thiết kế để giúp bạn vượt qua những rào cản này và phát triển kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề một cách toàn diện.
Khóa học cung cấp cho bạn một quy trình chi tiết và các phương pháp thực tiễn để giải quyết vấn đề hiệu quả qua sáu bước quan trọng: nhận diện vấn đề, xác định nguyên nhân, tìm kiếm và lựa chọn giải pháp, triển khai giải pháp, đo lường và đánh giá, và điều chỉnh và cải tiến. Bạn sẽ học cách sử dụng các công cụ như 5W1H, biểu đồ Ishikawa, và brainstorming để phân tích và tìm ra nguyên nhân gốc rễ của vấn đề. Ngoài ra, bạn sẽ được trang bị kỹ năng lập kế hoạch chi tiết và theo dõi hiệu quả của các giải pháp đã triển khai.
Trong suốt khóa học, bạn sẽ tham gia vào các bài tập thực hành, tình huống thực tế và thảo luận nhóm để áp dụng những gì đã học vào công việc hàng ngày. Bạn sẽ có cơ hội rèn luyện kỹ năng phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề, từ đó tự tin đối mặt và xử lý mọi thách thức một cách hiệu quả. Khóa học không chỉ giúp bạn nâng cao năng lực cá nhân mà còn góp phần vào sự phát triển bền vững của tổ chức.
Hãy tham gia khóa học "Giải quyết Vấn đề" ngay hôm nay để trở thành chuyên gia giải quyết vấn đề, tự tin đối mặt và xử lý mọi thách thức một cách hiệu quả và sáng tạo.
target_audience: Những nhà quản lý muốn giảm bớt sự nhức đầu khi các sự việc không mong muốn liên tục lặp đi lặp lại…
Những người đứng đầu các phòng ban mong muốn những vấn đề liên phòng ban được đón nhận và giải quyết một cách hiệu quả nhất
Những người thiết kế và cải tiến quy trình mong muốn thay đổi cách thức làm việc của tổ chức một cách có hệ thống.
Những hạt giống lãnh đạo muốn khẳng định năng lực cá nhân thông qua tư duy và hiệu quả công việc vượt trội…

courses.title: Z世代社会人1年生のための効率的な正しい仕事の進め方　～残業ゼロ達成～新社会人のためのタイムマネジメント＆タスク管理術
courses.bio: 「仕事が終わらない…」「毎日残業している…」「プライベートの時間がない…」 そんな悩みを抱える新社会人の方へ。この講座では、効率的な時間管理とタスク管理のスキルを習得し、残業ゼロを実現するための実践的なテクニックを学びます。
objectives: 時間管理の基礎と重要性：なぜ時間管理が必要か、そして効率的な時間の使い方を科学的根拠とともに学びます
タスクの優先順位付け：アイゼンハワーマトリックスを活用した優先順位の決定方法を実践的に習得できます
残業を減らすための具体的テクニック：メール対応、会議効率化、集中力向上など、すぐに実践できる方法を網羅しています
実践ワークでの定着：講義内容を自分の業務に落とし込む実践ワークで、確実にスキルを定着させます

残業ゼロ達成！時間管理＆タスク管理マスターテスト
ボーナスレクチャー: 【講師からの特別お知らせ】新社会人向け、はじめての上司との接し方講座：令和時代にマッチした上司と協働関係を築くための実践的アプローチ
【講師からの特別お知らせ】新社会人＆就活性必見　プレゼンも面接も怖くない　令和版 職場を生き抜く！論理的で多様な話し方講座

requirements: 特別な前提知識は必要ありません
自己成長への意欲と実践する姿勢
courses.description:
「仕事が終わらない…」「毎日残業している…」「プライベートの時間がない…」
そんな悩みを抱える新社会人の方へ。この講座では、効率的な時間管理とタスク管理のスキルを習得し、残業ゼロを実現するための実践的なテクニックを学びます。


このコースで学べること


時間管理の基礎と重要性：なぜ時間管理が必要か、そして効率的な時間の使い方を学びます
タスクの優先順位付け：アイゼンハワーマトリックスを活用した優先順位の決定方法を習得できます
タスク管理ツール（TrelloとAsana）の実践的活用法：基本操作から応用まで実際の画面を見ながら学べます
残業を減らすための具体的テクニック：メール対応、会議効率化、集中力向上など、すぐに実践できる方法を学びます
実践ワークによるスキルの定着：講義内容を自分の業務に落とし込む実践を通じて、確実にスキルを定着させます


このコースの特徴

段階的な学習設計：時間管理の基本理論から実践的なツール活用まで、体系的に学習できるカリキュラム構成になっています。各セクションは前のセクションの知識を基に構築されており、無理なく学習を進められます。
実践重視のアプローチ：講義を聴くだけでなく、実際に手を動かして学ぶ実践ワークを含んでいます。タスクの洗い出しや優先順位付け、ツールの設定など、すぐに業務に活かせる実践的スキルを習得できます。
現場で使えるツール解説：理論だけでなく、TrelloやAsanaといった実際の業務で活用できるタスク管理ツールの操作方法を解説します。無料プランでも十分に活用できる方法を紹介しています。
各レクチャー後の理解度チェック：各セクションの最後には復習クイズを設けており、学んだ内容の理解度を確認できます。理解が不十分な部分は再度復習することで、確実に知識を定着させられます。
オフィスワークに特化した内容：メール対応、会議効率化、集中力向上など、オフィスワークで直面する具体的な課題に対応したテクニックを紹介しています。明日から使える実用的な内容です。


こんな方におすすめ


社会人1〜3年目で時間管理に課題を感じている方
毎日のように残業している方
効率的な仕事の進め方を身につけたい方
タスク管理ツールを活用したいが使い方がわからない方
仕事とプライベートのバランスを取りたい方


コース内容
セクション1：時間管理の重要性と基礎
時間管理がもたらす具体的なメリット（仕事の効率化、ワークライフバランスの実現など）
時間管理を阻害する要因とその対処法
自分の時間の使い方を分析する方法
時間記録ツール（RescueTime、Toggl）の紹介とポモドーロテクニックの実践方法
セクション2：優先順位の付け方とタスク管理
緊急度と重要度によるタスクの分類法（アイゼンハワーマトリックス）
タスクの重要度、緊急度、影響範囲、所要時間、依存関係を考慮した優先順位の決定方法
重要タスクに集中するための環境作りとシングルタスクの実践
セクション3：タスク管理ツール実践編
Trelloの基本操作（ボード、リスト、カードの概念）と応用
Asanaを活用したプロジェクト管理（プロジェクト、タスク、サブタスクの概念）
チームでの効果的なタスク共有と連携方法
セクション4：残業を減らす仕事術
効率的なメール・チャットコミュニケーション術
会議時間を短縮する準備と進行のコツ
集中力を高める環境構築（整理整頓、騒音対策、適切な照明など）
効果的な休憩の取り方（1時間ごとに5分程度の休憩など）
セクション5：実践ワークと質疑応答
タスクの洗い出しと優先順位付けの実践
タスク管理ツール（Trello、Asana）での実際の業務管理演習
日々の時間管理改善のための振り返りワーク
質疑応答とまとめ


よくある質問

Q: プログラミングなどのITスキルは必要ですか？
A: 一切必要ありません。PCやスマートフォンの基本操作ができれば、どなたでも取り組めます。
Q: タスク管理ツールは有料ですか？
A: 講座で紹介するTrelloとAsanaは、基本機能であれば無料で利用できます。講座の内容は無料プランでも十分実践できるよう設計しています。
Q: 時間がないのに学習する時間をどう確保すればいいですか？
A: 各講義は3〜7分程度のコンパクトな設計です。通勤時間や昼休みなど、スキマ時間を活用して学習できます。また、学んだ内容をすぐに実践することで、むしろ時間が生み出される設計になっています。
Q: 会社特有のルールがある場合でも適用できますか？
A: 講座で紹介する手法は汎用的なもので、様々な業種・職種に応用可能です。会社固有のルールに合わせてアレンジするポイントも解説しています。


今すぐ始めましょう！
毎日の残業に悩むより、この講座で残業ゼロの働き方を目指しませんか？
このコースで学ぶ時間管理・タスク管理のスキルは、あなたの社会人生活を効率化する可能性を秘めています。仕事の効率化だけでなく、生涯にわたって活用できる「時間の使い方」の基本を身につけられます。
今すぐ受講して、残業に悩まされない充実した社会人生活を手に入れましょう！
target_audience: 社会人1〜3年目で時間管理に課題を感じている方
毎日のように残業している方
残業を減らしたいと考えている人
効率的な仕事の進め方を身につけたい方
タスク管理ツールを活用したいが使い方がわからない方
仕事とプライベートのバランスを取りたい方

Implementar as melhores práticas desde a iniciação até a conclusão do projeto

requirements: Transforme a maneira como seus projetos arquitetônicos são conduzidos e elevados ao sucesso com o nosso curso 'Gestão de Projetos para Arquitetura'. Descubra as métricas essenciais que definem o triunfo de um projeto e aprenda a aplicar estratégias de gestão que são a espinha dorsal dos empreendimentos mais renomados do setor.
courses.description:
Domine a Gestão de Projetos e Transforme sua Carreira em Arquitetura!
Você sabia que a gestão de projetos é a base para o sucesso dos empreendimentos mais renomados do setor? Com o curso 'Gestão de Projetos para Arquitetura', você aprenderá as estratégias, métricas e ferramentas que fazem a diferença entre projetos comuns e projetos excepcionais.
Por que você precisa deste curso?
Na arquitetura, gerenciar projetos vai além do design. É sobre garantir prazos, controlar custos, alinhar expectativas e entregar resultados que impressionam. Este curso é o seu guia definitivo para liderar projetos do início ao fim, com excelência.
O que você vai aprender:
Os pilares da gestão de projetos na arquitetura: Compreenda como planejar, executar e finalizar projetos com eficiência.
O papel do gerente de projetos: Desenvolva habilidades técnicas e interpessoais para liderar equipes e tomar decisões estratégicas.
Gestão de escopo: Saiba como evitar alterações que causam atrasos e aumentam custos.
Melhores práticas comprovadas: Aplique técnicas globais de gestão desde a fase de iniciação até a entrega final do projeto.
Métricas essenciais: Descubra como medir o sucesso dos seus projetos e assegurar resultados que superem as expectativas dos seus clientes.
Diferenciais do curso:
- Métodos comprovados e insights de especialistas do mercado.
- Ferramentas práticas para implementação imediata em seus projetos.
- Foco na personalização para o mercado arquitetônico, otimizando tempo e recursos.
Quem deve fazer este curso?
Arquitetos e profissionais que desejam:
Elevar seus projetos a um novo nível de profissionalismo.
Otimizar processos para entregar no prazo e dentro do orçamento.
Ganhar confiança para liderar equipes e superar desafios.
Não deixe o sucesso ao acaso!
Inscreva-se no curso 'Gestão de Projetos para Arquitetura' e construa uma carreira marcada por projetos icônicos e clientes satisfeitos.
Garanta sua vaga agora e dê o próximo passo rumo à excelência!
target_audience: Este curso é desenhado especialmente para arquitetos que trabalham diretamente com projetos e que desejam melhorar o seu dia a dia, com métodos de gestão pautados em práticas e ferramentas globalmente conhecidas e validadas pelo PMI - Project Management Institute, por meio do PMBOK.

courses.title: Gestão de Projetos - Na Prática
courses.bio: Uma abordagem prática
objectives: Definição do projeto e seus responsáveis
Elaboração das etapas e mapeamentos dos riscos
Criação, execução e acompanhamentos das ações do projetos
Realizar a análise de fatores importantes do projeto, como: EAP, Cronograma físico e Riscos, utilizando o gráfico de Gantt para melhor visualização e análise.
requirements: Noções básicas do uso do excel
courses.description:
No contexto em que o aluno estará aprendendo sobre a gestão de projetos, ele estará participando de uma revisão teórica sobre o assunto. Durante essa revisão, o aluno terá a oportunidade de absorver conhecimentos fundamentais sobre gestão de projetos, adquirindo uma compreensão mais profunda dos conceitos e melhores práticas associadas a essa disciplina.
Em seguida, os alunos aprenderão uma variedade de práticas essenciais para o sucesso na condução de projetos. Abaixo estão as principais habilidades e conhecimentos que serão abordados durante o curso:
Cadastro de projetos e responsáveis: Os alunos aprenderão a realizar o cadastro adequado de projetos, incluindo a definição dos objetivos, escopo, prazos e recursos necessários. Eles também entenderão como atribuir responsabilidades aos membros da equipe envolvida no projeto, garantindo uma distribuição clara de tarefas e papéis.
Elaboração de etapas e ações: Os alunos serão capacitados para desenvolver uma estrutura sólida de etapas e ações que compõem o projeto. Eles aprenderão a definir tarefas específicas, estabelecer prazos realistas e identificar as dependências entre as atividades, a fim de criar um plano de projeto abrangente.
Criação de mapa de riscos: Os alunos serão orientados sobre a importância de identificar os riscos associados a um projeto e aprenderão a criar um mapa de riscos. Isso envolve identificar possíveis ameaças ao projeto, avaliar sua probabilidade e impacto, e desenvolver estratégias de mitigação para minimizar os riscos e aumentar as chances de sucesso.
Análise de gráfico Gantt: O gráfico de Gantt é uma ferramenta popular na gestão de projetos. Os alunos aprenderão a criar e analisar um gráfico Gantt, que mostra visualmente as atividades do projeto ao longo do tempo. Eles entenderão como interpretar as informações do gráfico para planejar e monitorar o progresso do projeto de forma eficaz.
Atualização de etapas e ações: Durante a execução do projeto, é crucial monitorar e atualizar regularmente as etapas e ações planejadas. Os alunos aprenderão a realizar essa atualização de forma adequada, acompanhando o progresso das atividades, verificando o cumprimento dos prazos e ajustando o plano conforme necessário para garantir a conclusão bem-sucedida do projeto.
Gerenciamento geral de projeto: Os alunos serão introduzidos aos princípios e práticas fundamentais do gerenciamento de projetos. Isso inclui habilidades de comunicação eficaz, coordenação de equipes, alocação de recursos, resolução de conflitos e acompanhamento do desempenho geral do projeto. Eles aprenderão a lidar com os desafios comuns que podem surgir ao gerenciar um projeto e a aplicar estratégias para garantir o seu sucesso.
target_audience: Pessoas que possuam conhecimentos teóricos básicos em Gestão de Projetos e experiência em manuseio de planilhas do Excel.

courses.description:
FMEA is now a common strategy in organizations all over the world. In this course, you will learn the fundamental concepts you need to act as an agent for FMEA projects in your organization. This course will outline historical insights, primary methodologies, and core concepts associated with Process and Design FMEA. You will learn what FMEA means, how to run your FMEA from concept to completion, how to scope your FMEA project, and how to facilitate an effective FMEA and core methodologies of Process and Design FMEA. The course will also cover foundational concepts of FMEA. Students are asked to complete projects throughout the course. Our goal is to teach you the key concepts you need to act as an agent for FMEA in your organization. This course will outline a Foundation of knowledge for you. You will learn about the History of FMEA, Some Key methodologies used in FMEA, including the Risk Priority Number. This course will launch you into the world of FMEA.
What would you get after taking this course: FMEA Project?
You become FMEA Project leader.
Become a pro at asking tough brainstorming questions
Understand several real-life anecdotes from industry experts
Receive trainer assistance using the Q&A Discussion board
Add the FMEA credential to your resume
Become a problem solver for your business
Learn root-cause analysis techniques
Learn how to create an FMEA project dashboard
This FMEA Project is suitable for individuals from:
Engineering
Manufacturing
Maintenance and Reliability
Transaction processing
Business Process Outsourcing (BPO)
Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO)
Or any repeatable nature of business in the Service Industry
This FMEA project is not for anyone outside of the given scope.
This FMEA Project is comprehensive yet straightforward designed to help you learn FMEA Project tools and techniques using practical, real-life examples and lots of activities. As a bonus, in this FMEA Project, you will also learn to create complex statistical analyzes such as Hypothesis Testing, Design of Experiments, and Mistake Proofing.
Whether you want to:
Become an in-demand FMEA professional for potential service industry organizations
Go freelance and work from home, set your schedule and rates
Sharpen your process improvement skills to reach the advanced level
Bring your ideas to life with your first FMEA case study
This complete FMEA course is what you need and more. (You'll even get a certificate of completion to add to your arsenal).
What makes this course great?
Like you, thousands of others were frustrated and fed up with fragmented online know-it-all tutorials, which assumed you could understand the complex manufacturing jargon and left you without having you practice what you have learned.
Like you, they were tired of low-quality lessons, poorly explained topics and generally confusing info presented in the wrong way. Its high-definition, comprehensive tutorials are designed with simplicity and seamless progression in mind.
You will get the best-in-class support from the instructor for any questions you have related to the course.
The course is very well structured:
The course duration is 4.5 hours
You become an expert in FMEA tools and techniques
These 7 steps  over 50 short lectures
Each lecture covers bite-sized information; easy to grasp and apply
Each lecture consist of a video screencast
Each section is well-rounded with:
A section objective discussed at the beginning
o Then, the concept discussed at length
o Have examples are discussed to review concepts from a practical perspective
o This is followed either by an activity or a quiz
o Real Life Proficiency Hacks are added for you to be proficient in using this methodology
o Each section ends with an apt summary
· Numerical activities are supplemented with live process data
· There are several downloadable ready-to-use templates that are comprehensive and pertinently cover everything you'll need to run your FMEA Project
Using the Q&A discussion board, you receive trainer assistance on course-related questions.
The market is never short of jobs in quality, process excellence functions. There are great jobs. They only need skilled individuals. They are ready to hire individuals with hands-on knowledge who outshine the interview process.
**** A little more detail on FMEA Project Training and its Benefits ***
What is an FMEA?
The FMEA is a strategically designed set of tools and techniques that help improve business processes within an organization. The primary goal of FMEA is to drive access to organization access and prioritize risk.
What are the benefits of FMEA?
FMEA's helps your organization reduce variation and eliminate errors
An organization has several business processes. Each business process has its own unique set of procedures followed by individuals working in that business. Completing this training enables YOU to become crucial to your organization to identify and eliminate variation and repeatable process errors.
With an FMEA Project, you can help transform and enable your organization to increase revenue by identifying and eliminating errors that would otherwise have brought poor customer satisfaction and losses to the business. FMEA Project professionals can help reduce variation, errors, customer complaints, cycle time, cost, schedule delays, and spending/revenue leakages.
Improve your business and sustain the gains
Once you have your FMEA Project certification, you'll be able to prove you have the knowledge to identify gaps in an organization's business process, and you will be able to measure, analyze and improve those gaps. You will also have the ability to conduct a complete review of the current process and gain a clear understanding of their impact on the output.
You'll also develop the ability to achieve exceptional improvements in your business and sustain them by monitoring processes closely to ensure there is little or no deviation from the mean and taking corrective measures to improve your implemented actions.
FMEA is applicable across industries
What is the value of FMEA? FMEA techniques are applied in aerospace, electronics, telecom, banking and finance, IT, HR, marketing, and many more industries as an industry-independent methodology.
Getting an FMEA can lead to better job opportunities and improved salaries -. FMEA professionals get so much respect because the practical applications of FMEA tools and techniques require creative and out-of-the-box thinking - and executives and hiring managers at major companies are well aware.
With an FMEA Project, you will position yourself as a change agent, spearheading quality improvement throughout your team or organization, showcasing your leadership skillset. With FMEA Project, you become knowledgeable in dozens of different methods to streamline business processes, improve employee acceptance, reduce costs, and increase revenue - all of which lead to a better bottom line, no matter the industry.
As a professional, you need to adapt yourself to the changing demands of your industry. No matter what industry you are a part of, it would help adjust your knowledge to different situations.
Improve Your Managerial and Leadership Ability
FMEA Project training also prepares you for leadership roles, with the techniques and know-how to cut costs, increase revenue, and improve the business process's efficiency. Those who achieve complete this course are educated on the methodologies of FMEA. They are also prepared to become a change agent within their organization, leading efforts to improve processes, product quality, customer services, and Gain Hands-On Experience In Quality Management
Unlike a few other FMEA training, it includes hands-on work on industry projects and experience implementing theoretical principles to real-life scenarios. It looks at FMEA as a Project, not a spreadsheet.
target_audience: Service Industry and Manufacturing Operations Professionals

courses.title: PMP Exam Simulator 2025
courses.bio: PMP Exam Simulator 7th Editions
courses.description:
PMI PMP Certification and Exam Process
Project Management Institute (PMI) is an organization that offers accreditations to project management professionals. It is also involved in research, determination, and publication of standards with regards to project management. Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is one of the accreditations offered by PMI.
PMI PMP certification is designed for professionals who have demonstrated their expertise in the following areas:
performing general project-related tasks under the supervision
leading and directing teams in ensuring that projects are completed within the timelines and within the determined budgetary projections
applying the correct methodologies in delivering projects with regards to properly defined project requirements
To qualify for this certification, a candidate must first meet any of the prerequisites below:
Be a holder of a secondary degree
7500 hours of leading as well as directing team projects
A total of 35 hours of studying project management
Or
Be a holder of a 4-year degree
4500 hours of leading as well as directing team projects
35 hours of studying project management
Once you meet the above requirements, the next step is to register and schedule your PMP exam by following this certification process. Other details for this exam are available in the PMP Certification Handbook. PMP exam comprises 200 multiple-choice questions and an allocated time of 4 hours. 175 of these questions will be used to give you a score, while the other 25 are included for statistical purposes only. The last published exam score was done in 2005 and it was at 61%. As it is now, PMI no longer discloses its exams’ passing scores. The cost of this exam is $405 for PMI members and $555 for non-members.
Before sitting for the PMI PMP exam, it is important that a candidate thoroughly prepares for it. The preparation process involves understanding the exam objectives, enrolling in a live online training course, and using other resources. It is also recommended that a candidate goes through and understands the exam outline and PMP Body of Knowledge (PMPBOK) because the exams are based on these guidelines.
Passing the PMI PMP exam qualifies you for a PMI PMP certification that is valid for three years. To maintain it, you must earn 60 PDUs (Professional Development Units) every three years. This certification leads you to a number of job roles like PMP Certified Program Manager, Program Coordinator, Quality Assurance Specialist, Project Lead Technology Manager, and Program Manager.
target_audience: All students searching for project management

courses.description:
The course on Analyzing Risk is part of a series of courses that together form the Risk Management Certification Program (PMI-RMP). The Program is PMBOK6 aligned and includes the courses on Identifying Risk, Analyzing Risk and Responding to Risk.
What will you learn
After completing the course on Identifying Risk you will be able to:
identify the inputs to the Plan Risk Responses process,
identify strategies for responding to negative risks,
identify strategies for responding to positive risks,
recognize examples of using contingent response strategy,
recognize the outputs of the Plan Risk Responses process,
recognize the purpose of the Implement Risk Responses process,
identify the inputs to the Monitor Risks process,

courses.description:
Welcome to "Risk Management in Video Game Development", your in-depth guide to mastering risk management in the fast-paced world of game development. Whether you're a seasoned professional or new to the gaming industry, this course will provide you with the essential knowledge and practical skills to identify, assess, and mitigate risks across all phases of game development—ensuring your projects are completed on time, within budget, and with minimal disruptions.
Please consider contacting me directly so I can send you a direct link that guarantees I receive the majority of your hard-earned cash - if you apply here I only see about 35%!
I am offering this course for free to video game professionals who have lost their jobs as well as to all game students. Reach out! Spread the word!


Course Highlights:
Foundations of Risk Management: Gain a strong understanding of core risk management principles, focusing specifically on how risks affect video game development. Learn how risks related to technology, finances, and team dynamics can impact timelines and project scope.
Identifying Key Risk Factors: Learn to identify the unique risks present at each stage of the game development lifecycle, from pre-production through post-launch. Analyze how technical issues, budget constraints, and team management can become significant risk factors in both small indie and large-scale AAA projects.
Risk Assessment Tools: Develop your proficiency with industry-standard risk assessment tools such as risk matrices and probability-impact charts. Learn how to prioritize risks by their severity and likelihood, and gain the ability to make informed decisions on resource allocation to minimize project threats.
Risk Frameworks and Strategies: Explore various risk management frameworks that you can implement to effectively mitigate common risks, including legal, financial, and technical challenges. From crisis management to preventive strategies, you’ll learn how to prepare for unforeseen challenges and adapt quickly when they arise.
Crisis Management Techniques: Understand how to manage materialized risks by implementing effective crisis management strategies. Through case studies and simulations, you’ll practice responding to crisis scenarios and learn how to reduce their impact on project timelines and costs.
The Three Levels of Focus: Dive deep into the project, program and portfolio levels of risk management. Learn how each level affects the lens through which you identify and mitigate risk and the communication empowerment within and across each.
Building Risk Communication Skills: Master the art of risk communication. Develop strategies to communicate risks effectively to stakeholders, including how to draft clear and comprehensive risk reports and deliver presentations that keep your team informed and prepared for any potential issues.
Developing Comprehensive Risk Management Plans: Bring everything together by learning to create a thorough risk management plan. You’ll cover everything from identifying and assessing risks to mitigating and monitoring them over the course of your game development project. Submit your plan for peer review and receive actionable feedback.


What You Will Learn:
Identify and Assess Risks: Gain the skills to recognize and evaluate risks that arise during different stages of game development.
Mitigate Risks Effectively: Learn how to apply industry-recognized frameworks to manage and reduce risks to ensure your project stays on track.
Crisis Management: Develop strategies to manage risks that have already occurred and minimize their impact on your game development project.
The Six Steps of Risk Management: Learn the flow to identify, mitigate, communicate and monitor risks. Iterate and improve. Empower yourself and your teams with practical advice and examples.
Communicate Risks: Master risk reporting and communication strategies to keep your stakeholders informed and engaged.


Why Enroll?
Whether you’re a game developer, producer, project manager, indie studio owner, or someone entering the gaming industry, this course will provide you with the tools and techniques needed to navigate the risks associated with game development. From initial concept to final launch, you’ll be able to confidently manage and mitigate risks, ensuring your projects run smoothly and successfully.


Enroll now and take control of your project’s success with effective risk management strategies designed specifically for video game professionals!


Please consider contacting me directly so I can send you a direct link that guarantees I receive the majority of your hard-earned cash - if you apply here I only see about 35%!

New professionals in the gaming industry who want to deepen their understanding of risk management and learn how to mitigate risks in projects, from technical challenges to budget and timeline constraints.

Project managers and team leads in game development who are looking for practical strategies to manage risks throughout the game development lifecycle, particularly in mobile gaming, and to ensure project success.

Freelancers and indie game developers who may not have formal risk management training but need to develop skills to handle risks in smaller teams or solo projects, where resource management is critical.
Game production knowledge seekers, who wish to hone their skills

courses.description:
Are you ready to elevate your career and master Jira Advanced Roadmap ? If so, you've come to the right place!
This course walks through all the core and advanced features and functionality of JIRA Plans(JIRA Advanced Roadmaps) - JIRA’s project planning and agile road-mapping tool, that is now available with Jira Premium.
As a Udemy Instructor, I have helped more than 28,000 professionals (and counting).
The tool, formerly known as the popular add-on Portfolio, became so widely used and valued that Atlassian acquired it and integrated it directly into Jira Premium subscriptions on Cloud.
Jira Plans are incredibly useful for Agile project planning as they provide a clear overview of work across teams, enabling better resource allocation and prioritization. With features like customizable timelines, dependencies management, and capacity planning, teams can align their efforts with organizational goals while adapting quickly to changes. This helps maintain transparency and ensures that all stakeholders are on the same page throughout the project lifecycle.
Advanced Roadmaps or JIRA Plans operates on the Iron Triangle of planning, which focuses on Scope, Time, and Resources as the primary constraints and planning parameters. In this course, you’ll discover how to balance these factors effectively to create realistic product roadmaps, set achievable release dates, and develop comprehensive project plans.
Jira Plans are utilized by various roles in product development, including product managers, project managers, and Scrum Masters, to strategize and align work across teams. Development leads and team members also leverage these plans to track progress, manage dependencies, and ensure alignment with broader organizational objectives.
COVERAGE OF THE COURSE:
Get started with Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - This section will give you a quick rundown of the tools and features you’ll find within your plan, and how they help you plan work for your organization or team.
Configure Jira with Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - Configure advanced settings for your advanced roadmaps or plans
Set up your Advanced Roadmaps or Plan and change its settings - Understand various Plan Level settings to make the best use of Advanced Roadmaps or Plans
Manage and edit issues with Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - Issues are the building blocks of your plan. You can import issues from issue sources from existing projects, or you can create new issues directly in your plan then save them.
Estimate and schedule issues in your Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - An important aspect of planning work is scheduling how long each issue will take to complete. How you schedule issues depends on how your teams are set up, and how you’ve configured your instance.
Create different planning scenarios in your Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - The Scenarios tool helps you to plan for and assess the impact of possible outcomes by mapping out different “what if” versions of your plan.
Manage capacity in your Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - Learn how to balance your team's workload using capacity and velocity and create a plan that works.
Manage releases in your Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - Releases are milestone that are critical for your success. Understand how to configure and work with Releases
Manage teams in your Advanced Roadmaps or Plan - Teams are real people working to bring your plan to life. See various ways you can configure teams in advanced roadmaps or plans
View and manage dependencies in your Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - Understand and remove dependencies in your advanced roadmap or plans before they become impediment
Resolve warnings in your Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - While scheduling work for your teams, your plan alerts you to errors such as misaligned dates in your plan. Using the warnings dropdown menu, you can modify which warnings are shown, filter issues by warning type, and troubleshoot common warnings.
Change how your Advanced Roadmaps or Plan displays your data - Your plan offers several ways to show only the work that matters most to you.
Review and save changes made in your Advanced Roadmaps or Plans - Save changes drafted in a plan to update work in projects.
Share and export your Advanced Roadmaps or Plan - Learn how to share the Plan with relevant stakeholders.
This curriculum balances foundational Agile principles with hands-on, practical applications of Jira Advanced Roadmaps, ensuring learners can directly implement what they learn.
Course enrollment grants you lifetime access, with no expiration, to all the course lectures, activities, handouts, and quizzes. In addition, you’ll also receive 1-on-1 support for any questions or uncertainties that come up. And this all comes with a money-back guarantee. You have nothing to lose and so much knowledge to gain.
Feel free to share any suggestions or additional details you'd like to include. I welcome feedback to further enhance the course's practical relevance for working professionals.

courses.description:
This course offers an in-depth exploration of essential project management concepts aligned with the standards outlined by the Project Management Institute (PMI). With a clear focus on preparing students for the PMP Certification and exam, it equips aspiring project managers with the theoretical foundation needed to understand and navigate the complexities of project management. The curriculum emphasizes not only the principles but also the practices embedded within PMI’s framework, making it a valuable resource for those seeking to enhance their project management capabilities in alignment with industry standards.
The course begins by familiarizing students with the significance of PMP Certification, the role of PMI, and how the certification reflects evolving practices in the field. The curriculum delves into the structure and domains of the PMP exam, offering insights into eligibility requirements and the application process. Through these topics, students gain clarity on what it takes to pursue certification and why it can serve as a career accelerator by enhancing their professional credibility. By the end of this section, students will have a solid grasp of how PMP certification aligns with their career goals and the broader landscape of project management.
Conflict management is another core focus, helping students develop strategies to identify and resolve conflicts within project teams. Understanding sources of conflict and the stages they progress through enables project managers to address issues proactively. The course highlights the importance of conflict resolution in Agile environments, emphasizing the delicate balance required to harmonize diverse perspectives within high-performing teams. This section provides tools and techniques that empower project managers to turn conflict into opportunities for growth and innovation, all while ensuring smooth team dynamics.
Leadership plays a pivotal role in project success, and this course offers students the tools to build and lead motivated teams. It explores various leadership styles, guiding students on how to adapt their approach based on project needs and team dynamics. The section on leadership also introduces students to the principles of servant leadership, which fosters collaboration and support among team members. Students will leave with practical strategies to set clear visions, inspire teams, and cultivate inclusive environments where every member feels empowered to contribute.
Team development and performance management are integral components of successful project execution, and this course dedicates substantial attention to these areas. Students learn how to appraise skills, build teams around strengths, and implement resource planning strategies that enhance productivity. Additionally, the curriculum explores the continuous development of teams and the transfer of knowledge within projects, ensuring that team members remain aligned with project objectives. This holistic approach to team building prepares students to manage both in-person and virtual teams, addressing common challenges such as time zone differences, cultural variations, and engagement strategies for remote work.
Students will also explore the management of stakeholders, focusing on identifying, categorizing, and engaging key stakeholders effectively. This section emphasizes the need to build strong relationships and manage expectations through clear communication strategies. As stakeholder involvement is critical to the success of any project, students will gain insights into aligning stakeholder interests with project goals, thereby ensuring smooth collaboration and long-term value delivery.
Throughout the course, students are introduced to the concept of emotional intelligence as an essential skill for managing team performance and conflict. By integrating emotional intelligence into their project management practices, students learn how to assess team behavior, address emotional needs, and leverage empathy to foster productive working environments. Emotional intelligence becomes a valuable tool for enhancing project outcomes, supporting leadership roles, and managing complex interpersonal dynamics within teams.
The course concludes by examining mentorship and the development of future project leaders. Students will understand the importance of mentorship within the context of project management and gain practical techniques for identifying opportunities to mentor others. These lessons emphasize the value of nurturing leadership skills within teams, encouraging continuous growth, and fostering a culture of shared knowledge and collaboration.
By the end of the course, students will possess a deep theoretical understanding of project management, with insights that extend beyond passing the PMP exam. They will be well-equipped with strategies and knowledge that can be applied across various industries, ensuring they are prepared not only for certification but also for success in real-world project management roles. This course lays a strong foundation for future leaders, enabling them to navigate the challenges of modern project management with confidence and skill.
target_audience: Aspiring Project Managers – Individuals seeking to build foundational project management knowledge and earn their PMP certification.
Experienced Project Managers – Professionals aiming to validate their skills with the globally recognized PMP credential.
Team Leads and Managers – Leaders looking to enhance their ability to manage teams, stakeholders, and project deliverables effectively.
Career Changers – Professionals from other industries wanting to transition into project management roles.
PMP Exam Candidates – Individuals preparing for the PMP exam and seeking a structured, theory-based approach to study.
Agile Practitioners – Professionals looking to integrate traditional project management practices with agile methodologies.
Consultants and Freelancers – Independent professionals working on projects who want to formalize their project management skills and increase their marketability.

courses.description:
Discover excellence in project management and how more and more companies are using Critical chain project management principles with remarkable results in their projects. From Siemens to Mazda, a large variety of project management teams are increasingly using this method in their project management and product delivery efforts.
Companies that are using Critical Chain Project management (CCPM) tools and principles are experiencing following benefits with this approach:
Due Date performance (DDP) improved to 90%+ from average of 30% (3x improvement)
Delivery date performance improved by 200%+
Reliability, satisfaction and perception of client improved
Schedule durations reduced
Cost reduced without sacrificing scope
Quality improved
Team morale improved & stress, chaos and friction among project team reduced
Reduced cycle time of projects
It has shown an average of around 3x better results as compared to traditional methods in project due date performance! On average, the Due Date performance (DDP) - projects completed in time -  improved to 90%+ from average of 30% in most of the companies (3x improvement) that implemented it. With improved reliability, higher quality and reduced cost.
The results are not surprising. given that CCPM is an application of the Theory of Constraints (TOC) that has shown such consistent results in Manufacturing, Retail, Distribution etc.
TOC average results/performance are as follows:
Cycle time mean reduction 65%
Inventory levels mean reduction 49%
Revenue mean increase 83%
Throughput mean increase 65%
Profitability mean increase 116%
Critical chain was introduced by Eli Goldratt in 1997 and evolved over the years. The skills have proven to be one of the most efficient project delivery methods. With CCPM, you can deliver projects faster and effectively. It fosters an environment of constant collaboration, teamwork, and focus on execution.
It can be applied in a single project or in a multi-project environment. It can be applied in isolation, or the principles and tools can be combined with other project methods such as Agile, Scrum or Kanban. Since CCPM seeks to reduce work in progress(WIP), it is more closer to Kanban principles.
You will command a strong focus on delivering customer value and exceeding expectations.
You will learn important concepts not covered in project management training such as Task durations, reducing stress among team members, and roles and responsibilities for key stakeholders.
Value for money.
A guide/process to follow.
Excel downloadable templates for Status reports, task management and delay reports.
The knowledge, skills and principles you learn are versatile to give you a holistic view of projects and can be combined beneficially with any of the methods that you are currently using in your projects. It will give you the skills to manage projects in a new light and give you a competitive edge in this knowledge economy. You will manage your projects in a much better way..
At the end of this course, you will receive a Certificate of completion that you can Download as a PDF file. There is also a 30-day money back guarantee. Moreover, Udemy requires those who get enrolled are given full lifetime access, so they can refer back whenever they want.

courses.description:
Complete Problem-Solving Program
This course contains everything you need to know to achieve excellence in problem-solving and critical-thinking skills. In this training, you will learn problem-solving techniques and approach challenges with the right mindset. You will discover how to effectively analyze the causes of problems and work with a team to find the best solutions. Gone are the days when problem-solving and decision-making occurred solely in the boss's office. With the start of the 21st century, the world changed – traditional management hierarchies gave way to open offices, and problem-solving and decision-making skills became essential at all organizational levels. Today, these skills are a necessity for every employee and manager. Mastering problem-solving and decision-making skills alone is not enough. The modern workplace requires new-age managers and leaders to expand their creative thinking potential and use it in problem-solving and decision-making processes. These skills are no longer confined to management; students aspiring for their dream jobs must possess them. That is why we have created this practical and thoroughly researched course, combining all these problem-solving, critical thinking, and decision-making skills into one place.
This course is for you if you have ever needed to work on your creative thinking ability, problem-solving skills, or decision-making capability. Prepare to learn and discover your hidden potential. The course also includes examples and practical exercises to illustrate each point.
Why join this training?
Do you want to learn how to solve the problems you encounter using excellent problem-solving skills?
Do you want to learn how to identify the causes of a problem and find solutions through critical thinking?
Or do you want to know how to select a solution, implement it, and evaluate its effectiveness through decision-making skills?
This training is for you! Nowadays, problem-solving is a crucial skill for success. Whether you are an employee or entrepreneur, you must be able to analyze, evaluate options, and make decisions. Most people feel overwhelmed with stress when faced with a problem. They feel paralyzed and cannot structure their thoughts. There are reasons for these phenomena, but there are also techniques to overcome them.


You don't have to guess; here are just a few skills you will learn in this training:
Changing your perception of problems and adopting the right mindset for problem-solving
Learning to identify and formulate a problem through critical thinking
Discovering methods to find innovative solutions using problem-solving skills
Learning to unleash your creativity for better decision-making
Evaluating and selecting the best solutions
Successfully implementing the chosen solutions
This is not a theoretical course – I share problem-solving techniques you can apply immediately to achieve results. So what are you waiting for? Click the "Buy now" button and learn how to take your problem-solving skills to the next level. Your success depends on your ability to lead teams! High-performing team leaders are promoted and succeed as entrepreneurs. Leading teams is a critical competence for leaders at all levels today, and problem-solving is the basic methodology that drives improvement by teams and lean organizations. I recommend taking this course with your team to practice each method in real work. This is not an "academic" course; it is based on working in manufacturing, healthcare, and other industries with hundreds of teams tackling real-world problems and engaging in continuous improvement.
target_audience: This course supports the development of emotional intelligence, helping make better decisions. It is aimed at everyone who wants to develop problem-solving and decision-making skills. This course will help you understand your reality and how it differs from others, how your emotions can influence your impulses, and how you can use mindfulness and creativity to drive your decisions and solve problems.

This course will NOT give you quick fixes or answers to your problems, but it will help you develop the capability to solve them yourself. It is designed for individuals who want to improve their problem-solving skills and become more effective in their personal and professional lives.

The course suits a wide range of learners, including students, professionals, entrepreneurs, and anyone interested in enhancing their critical thinking and decision-making abilities. It offers comprehensive techniques and problem-solving frameworks that can be applied personally and professionally, benefiting you and your team.

Whether you are just starting your career, looking to advance in your current position, or facing challenges in your personal life, this course provides the tools and techniques to tackle complex problems confidently. By offering a comprehensive and structured approach to problem-solving, the course ensures that learners from various backgrounds can apply the skills they acquire to a diverse array of situations, making it valuable for anyone looking to become a more effective problem solver.

courses.description:
FREE - 42 Page 'Guide to managing innovative' projects available for download with this course.
Why innovation project management?
Innovation has become a buzzword in recent years, however, now more than ever it is essential for companies to stay ahead of competitors, new entrants and changing market trends. Change is accelerating. As technology continues to progress at faster and faster rates we are seeing more and more new applications making old business models obsolete. Consider the rise of Uber, Tesla, Air BnB, Spotify, Netflix and Amazon and how they are revolutionising our lives. Traditional businesses know that they must innovate, but many are not doing so effectively. It's one thing having great ideas, quite another to deliver on them. That's where innovation project management comes in. Skilled Innovation PM's can take an idea and help to turn it into a reality. It's a skill that will be in demand more and more in the future.
What you will get from this course
As an innovation project manager you will learn what makes innovation projects different from conventional projects and why it's necessary to change your mindset and skills to be able to deliver innovation effectively. This course will provide you with the know how to manage innovative projects and deliver them successfully.
David Richmond is an innovation consultant with many years of innovation experience, working with both large blue chip organisations and their clients and small start up businesses. He is the founder and managing director of Richmond Innovation that specialises in transforming businesses through culture development, process integration, idea management and agile project delivery. David is also a highly qualified project manager and innovator and he is a PRINCE2 Agile® practitioner, certified Scrum Master, a post graduate in project management and he is a certified coach and experienced trainer.
The course covers a range of subjects including:
What makes innovation projects different.
Innovation Business case development.
Innovation Risk management.
Agile project approaches in an innovation context.
Project planning.
Reducing bureaucracy.
Business as usual handover.
Learning and continuous improvement.
You will learn how to deliver innovative projects effectively in the organisation. This will set you apart from conventional project managers and provide you with knowledge and skills that are likely to be in high demand in the future.
While there are no prerequisites for the course, the course is aimed at existing project or innovation professionals, or those with an active interest in innovation project delivery. The course does not intend to cover conventional project methodologies in detail but it will refer to them so those coming to the course with no knowledge of project management may like to do some additional reading.

requirements: You need a Project Management Tool. Anything you want from pen & paper to Trello, Notepad, Asana, Jira, Wrike, etc.
A sound knowledge of Project Management and project stages
courses.description:
Do you see other people getting their projects done while you struggle with scope creep and are late on deadlines?
Do you want to know how to keep your projects organized and have realistic estimates?
At the beginning of my project management career, I read all the project management books, articles, and case studies that I could handle. BUT the reality of day to day projects was that after few weeks in a project, all the estimates were obsolete and things were getting out of control.
What am I doing wrong? - I was continuously asking myself.
Why are we bad in doing estimates?
How do I stop the clients from changing their mind and continuously adding to the project scope?
Is it because tracking change requests doesn't keep me away from scope creep, but pushes me away of project completion?
It took me years to truly learn what it takes to keep a projects on track and to successfully deliver them.
The key for my project management success has been "stealing the job" from the other successful project managers. I learned and I asked the other project managers who I admired, HOW they do it? How they literally define the scope, how they lead a meeting, how they manage the team, how they do the estimations so they can complete the project up to the client's satisfaction?
Learning how others do it is what made me a successful project manager.
So I made this course to start giving back from my knowledge which is the product of many years of work.

This course is a strictly practical course. I use 3 different projects examples:
Opening a coffee shop
Launching a coaching business
An IT project
Using real examples, I'll walk you through everything you should to consider in your projects:
How to define the scope and manage your scope to avoid scope creep? I'll take exact examples of scope components, define them and show you how to manage it in real life situations. You'll see how I manage the scope in different situations.
How important it is to define the quality of your project deliverables and how to do it so it doesn't look overwhelming.
Team management from the project perspective.
Who are the stakeholders, who we should consider? Who are the ones you should focus your energy on?
Time management in practice. This will not be about methods and formulas. I will show you how to move from "we made bad estimations" to an objective analysis of the assumptions we make when making estimations and how to see that information for a better time management in projects.
What we should communicate in projects and how? How to share the information with the team so it makes their work more enjoyable, and how defining the communication expectations can prevent so many issues.
What are the positive risks and how to maximize them and how risk assessment can take your project to the next level.
I'll show you all that with step-by-step examples of how to do it. No theory, no stories, BUT real life successful and failing projects. This is what makes this course perfect for both professional project managers but also for entrepreneurs and team members.
For whom is this course?

Business Owners
Entrepreneurs
Project managers
Team members
EVERYBODY who works in projects
What this course can do for you?
You can take your own projects and work with me in the same time to all the asptects of the project.
At the end of the course you will have a completely defined project scope, an organised project and you will know how to manage it.
You can also take a running project and work with me to update it while taking the course.
In that case, at the end of the course you will have an organized project and you will know what you need to do to keep it on track.
30-day money back guarantee
All Udemy courses come with a 30-day money back guarantee. So there is no risk to try the course. Go ahead and sign up today, and have this course help you be more successful managing all your projects for the rest of your career.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to manage their own projects
Anyone who wants to get more structured in day to day work
Project Managers who want to see how other project managers manage projects
Entrepreneurs who struggle with scope creep and incorrect estimations in their projects
